resources.string: [ { \"ques\":\"Which team is the defending champions of IPL?\", \"option1\":\"Mumbai Indians\", \"option2\":\"Kolkata Knight Riders\", \"option3\":\"Sunrisers Hyderabad\", \"answer\":\"Mumbai Indians\" }, { \"ques\":\"How many characters died in Avengers:Infinity War?\", \"option1\":\"14\", \"option2\":\"13\", \"option3\":\"16\", \"answer\":\"16\" }, { \"ques\":\"Which firm was associated with Facebook\'s recent data leak incident?\", \"option1\":\"WikiLeaks\", \"option2\":\"Cambridge Analytica\", \"option3\":\"Hotjar\", \"answer\":\"Cambridge Analytica\" }, { \"ques\":\"Which of the following automobile company is not a subsidiary of Volkswagen group?\", \"option1\":\"Audi\", \"option2\":\"BMW\", \"option3\":\"Porsche\", \"answer\":\"BMW\" }, { \"ques\":\"Zend, Symfony and Yii are frameworks of which programming language?\", \"option1\":\"PHP\", \"option2\":\"Python\", \"option3\":\"Ruby\", \"answer\":\"PHP\" }]
